title: Part A
stimulusHtml: One point for identifying and explaining a continuity in European family life from 1700 through 1900.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

One point for identifying and explaining a continuity in European family life from 1700 through 1900.

The student response earns one of the following points:

One point for identifying and explaining a continuity in European family life from 1700 through 1900.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: One point for identifying and explaining a change in European family life from 1700 through 1900.

The student response earns one of the following points:

One point for identifying and explaining a change in European family life from 1700 through 1900.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: One point for identifying and explaining another distinct change in European family life from 1700 through 1900.
